I'm Jeta,
Junior FrontEnd Developer.

Hi, I’m Jeta. Nice to meet you.

I'm passionate about creating engaging and intuitive web experiences. With a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I specialize in building responsive and visually appealing websites. Currently, I'm seeking opportunities to grow my skills and contribute to exciting projects. My focus is on writing clean, efficient code and delivering high-quality, user-centric solutions. I'm eager to collaborate and make a positive impact in the world of web development.

Responsive Design

I specialize in creating responsive, mobile-friendly websites that provide an optimal viewing experience across a wide range of devices. By using flexible grids, layouts, and CSS media queries, I ensure that your site looks great and functions perfectly on any screen size.

HTML & CSS

With a strong foundation in HTML5 and CSS3, I build well-structured, semantic, and visually appealing web pages. My code is clean, efficient, and follows best practices, ensuring that your website is not only attractive but also accessible and SEO-friendly.

JavaScript

Proficient in JavaScript, I create dynamic and interactive web experiences that enhance user engagement and functionality. From implementing complex features and animations to integrating third-party APIs, I ensure that your website is both interactive and intuitive.

Problem Solving

With strong problem-solving skills, I debug and optimize code to ensure seamless performance and user experience. Whether it's fixing bugs, improving load times, or enhancing features, I focus on delivering robust solutions that address your specific needs and challenges.

Interested in collaborating with me?

I’m always open to discussing product design work or partnership opportunities.
